1960.chat_state_2: Hurry and return to Sensei Wu!
1960.chat_state_3_turnin: Been staying frosty out there? Hah!
1960.chat_state_4: I have enjoyed our time together. Chilling, as you call it?
1960.completion_succeed_tip: Speak to Sensei Wu in the Ninjago Monastery.
1960.in_progress: Zane wants you to return to Sensei Wu in the Ninjago Monastery.
1960.offer: Please return to Sensei Wu. Next you must quest for the Shurikens of Ice!
1960.ready_to_complete: I hear you and Zane got into some mischief together! Hah! Good to hear that he is thawing out!

1961.accept_chat_bubble: The red banners bear the symbol of Fire!
1961.chat_state_1: Only 1 form of Spinjitzu remains for you to learn!
1961.chat_state_2: Follow the red banners to find the Dojo of Fire!
1961.chat_state_3_turnin: Master sent you? Good, he saved the best for last!
1961.completion_succeed_tip: Speak to Kai in the Monastery Dojo of Fire.
1961.in_progress: Sensei Wu wants you to speak to Kai. Find him in the Monastery Dojo of Fire.
1961.offer: Do you burn for further knowledge of Spinjitzu? Time to train with the most fiery of my students! Find Kai!
1961.ready_to_complete: Don't worry, I was a complete noob at one point too. Hope you learn as fast as I did!

1962.accept_chat_bubble: Put on the Gi, Hood and Pants you just got out of this chest.
1962.chat_state_1: If you're gonna be a Fire Ninja, you gotta look the part!
1962.chat_state_2: Check your Backpack for the Fire Kit package. If it's not there, check your Mailbox!
1962.chat_state_3: Yep, I think red's your color!
1962.in_progress: Equip all 3 pieces of the Fire Ninja kit.
1962.offer: Okay, let's heat things up a few more degrees! Put on the Fire Ninja kit you got out of this chest.
1962.ready_to_complete: Now you can use red Fire Spinjitzu Lanterns to launch yourself into the air! It's a blast!

1963.chat_state_2: Go on, get outta here! Master is waiting for you!
1963.chat_state_3_turnin: Kai has trained you well, I hope?
1963.completion_succeed_tip: Speak to Sensei Wu in the Ninjago Monastery.
1963.in_progress: Kai wants you to return to Sensei Wu in the Ninjago Monastery.
1963.offer: I've taught you all I can for now. Sensei Wu needs your help recovering the Sword of Fire, so go back and see him!
1963.ready_to_complete: Just in time! Frakjaw, the Skeleton of Fire, has led a Skeleton strike force into the Fire Shrine! You must stop him!

1964.accept_chat_bubble: A red Fire Spinjitzu Lantern will blast you up to the entrance to the Fire Shrine!
1964.chat_state_1: Frakjaw must not be allowed to claim the Sword of Fire!
1964.chat_state_2: You may not want to face Frakjaw alone! Take some fellow Ninjas with you!
1964.chat_state_3: The Skeletons may still be here, but I feel a great sense of relief.
1964.completion_succeed_tip: Return to Sensei Wu in the Ninjago Monastery.
1964.in_progress: Interact with the red Dragon Statue in the Ninjago Caves to find the Fire Shrine. Then defeat Frakjaw to recover the Sword of Fire.
1964.offer: A Dragon statue guards the way into the Fire Shrine in the caves below! Enter and defeat Frakjaw to protect the Sword of Fire!
1964.ready_to_complete: The Weapons of Spinjitzu are safe! But Lord Garmadon will come at us again. We must be ready!

2021.accept_chat_bubble: Hari Howzen told me she's seen Chopov lurking in the Earth Shrine below the Monastery.
2021.chat_state_1: You've faced Chopov once already, right?
2021.chat_state_2: Don't try to equip the weapon, I don't know what it will do to you!
2021.chat_state_3: Did you find out why he's called Chopov?
2021.completion_succeed_tip: Take the Maelstrom Dark Blade back to Nya in the Ninjago Monastery.
2021.in_progress: Smash Chopov in the Earth Shrine until he drops a Maelstrom Dark Blade, then take it back to Nya.
2021.offer: I've heard that Chopov, one of the Skeleton leaders, carries a nasty Maelstrom Dark Blade. Let's try to reforge that!
2021.ready_to_complete: Now that is dangerous looking. Go smash some Skeletons with it!

2022.accept_chat_bubble: Make sure you don't bring back a leg or something! Eeew!
2022.chat_state_1: Who fights with a bone? Besides Skeletons. And cavemen.
2022.chat_state_2: Don't let Furious Urufu get a hold of this!
2022.chat_state_3: You got a bone to pick with me?
2022.completion_succeed_tip: Take the Maelstrom Bone back to Nya in the Ninjago Monastery.
2022.in_progress: Smash Krazi in the Lightning Shrine until he drops a Maelstrom Bone, then take it back to Nya.
2022.offer: With all of these Maelstrom weapons around, you'd have to be Krazi to fight with a Maelstrom Bone! Smash him and get his weapon!
2022.ready_to_complete: That thing was really creepy! Now it's just creepy. Have fun with it!

2023.accept_chat_bubble: Look for the Commandos by the edges of the Battlefield!
2023.chat_state_1: I think I'm getting the hang of this reforging stuff!
2023.chat_state_2: Bring the Axe right back so we can purify it!
2023.chat_state_3: Okay, let's purify that nasty ol' axe!
2023.completion_succeed_tip: Take the Maelstrom Bone Axe back to Nya in the Ninjago Monastery.
2023.in_progress: Smash Skeleton Commandos on the Ninjago Battlefield until you retrieve a Maelstrom Bone Axe, then take it back to Nya.
2023.offer: A Bone's just a Bone, but add a blade to it and you have something worse! Get me a Maelstrom Bone Axe!
2023.ready_to_complete: You're gonna go on quite the chopping spree with this bad boy!

2024.accept_chat_bubble: I'd never try forging with a Maelstrom Hammer. Too scary.
2024.chat_state_1: Let's use the Skeletons' armory against them!
2024.chat_state_2: Do the Skeletons have any girl blacksmiths? Shudder.
2024.chat_state_3: I can't wait to try this thing out for myself!
2024.completion_succeed_tip: Take the Maelstrom Blacksmith's Hammer back to Nya in the Ninjago Monastery.
2024.in_progress: Smash Skeleton Blacksmiths on the Ninjago Battlefield until you retrieve a Maelstrom Blacksmith's Hammer, then take it back to Nya.
2024.offer: Now that we have this Paradox invention, maybe we can figure out how the Skeletons forge their weapons! Bring me a Maelstrom Blacksmith's Hammer!
2024.ready_to_complete: Okay, let's try this machine out. Whoa! It removed all of the Maelstrom!

2025.accept_chat_bubble: How many Skeletons have you smashed so far? Gotta be some kind of Achievement for that!
2025.chat_state_2: I wonder what the Skeletons do with all the slag from their forge? Probably eat it.
2025.chat_state_3: That is one nasty looking weapon. Well, technically two.
2025.completion_succeed_tip: Take the Maelstrom Double Bone Dagger back to Nya in the Ninjago Monastery.
2025.in_progress: Smash Skeleton Raiders in the Ninjago Caves until you find a Maelstrom Double Bone Dagger, then take it back to Nya.
2025.offer: The Skeletons don't just forge with metal - they use bone as well! Get me a Maelstrom Double Bone Dagger so I can study it!
2025.ready_to_complete: It's all purified and that thing is still scary looking!

2026.accept_chat_bubble: What's worse than a mace to the face? Nothing.
2026.chat_state_1: Frakjaw scares me. And there's not much that scares me.
2026.chat_state_2: Take some back-up if you're gonna face down Frakjaw!
2026.chat_state_3: Just looking at that thing makes me want to go put a helmet on!
2026.completion_succeed_tip: Take the Maelstrom Mace back to Nya in the Ninjago Monastery.
2026.in_progress: Smash Frakjaw in the Fire Shrine until he drops his Maelstrom Mace, then take it back to Nya.
2026.offer: Frakjaw carries a heavy spiked ball on a chain. That'll ruin your day! Ruin his and get me that Maelstrom Mace!
2026.ready_to_complete: The Skeletons' Maelstrom Weapons are still dangerous, but at least we know how to deal with them! You da Ninja!

2027.accept_chat_bubble: I love all these cool weapons! Even if they can hurt you.
2027.chat_state_1: I was thinking of asking for a Maelstrom Feather Duster, but I have a better idea!
2027.chat_state_2: Make sure you show off your other weapons! Tell 'em you got them from me!
2027.chat_state_3: For an evil weapon of doom, that is pretty cool-looking!
2027.completion_succeed_tip: Take the Maelstrom Double-Bladed Axe back to Nya in the Ninjago Monastery.
2027.in_progress: Smash Skeleton Overseers in the Siege Towers until you retrieve a Maelstrom Double-Bladed Axe, then take it back to Nya.
2027.offer: What's worse than a Bone Axe? How about a Double-Bladed Axe? Go and get me one!
2027.ready_to_complete: Don't cut yourself shaving with this! Actually, don't shave with this, period!

2028.accept_chat_bubble: Troopers mass near the bridge, but you'll need to scout the outer areas to find Commandos.
2028.chat_state_1: Look what they've done to our front lawn!
2028.chat_state_2: Make sure you have plenty of Imagination before you go down there!
2028.completion_succeed_tip: Return to Toshiro Gojira, the Monastery Guard.
2028.in_progress: Smash 10 Skeleton Troopers and 3 Skeleton Commandos on the Ninjago Battlefield.
2028.offer: We need to crack down on these boneheads! Smash 10 Skeleton Troopers and 3 Skeleton Commandos!
2028.offer_repeatable: Still too many boneheads out there! Smash 10 Troopers and 3 Commandos!
2028.ready_to_complete: Okay that's a little better. Kind of.

2029.chat_state_1: Who ordered all these Skeleton lawn ornaments?
2029.chat_state_2: Make sure you're armored up to face those terrors!
2029.completion_succeed_tip: Return to Toshiro Gojira, the Monastery Guard.
2029.in_progress: Smash 8 Skeleton Blacksmiths and 3 Skeleton Marksmen on the Ninjago Battlefield.
2029.offer: I can't stand listening to all this bony racket! Smash 8 Skeleton Blacksmiths and 3 Skeleton Marksmen!
2029.offer_repeatable: I can't stand listening to all this bony racket! Smash 8 Skeleton Blacksmiths and 3 Skeleton Marksmen!
2029.ready_to_complete: Ahh, that's more peaceful. Except for that huge battle down there, of course.

2030.accept_chat_bubble: Those Skeletons down there are tough! Be careful!
2030.chat_state_1: I can't stand all that whining and howling! And that's just from me!
2030.chat_state_2: Use the Imagination Altars if you need to recharge your Spinjitzu!
2030.completion_succeed_tip: Return to Hari Howzen at the mouth of the Ninjago Caves.
2030.in_progress: Smash 4 Skeleton Raiders and 2 Bone Wolves in the Ninjago Caves.
2030.offer: Too many scary things down in these caves! Smash 4 Skeleton Raiders and 2 Bone Wolves!
2030.offer_repeatable: Too many scary things down in these caves! Smash 4 Skeleton Raiders and 2 Bone Wolves!
2030.ready_to_complete: Too bad you can't smash the dark! I'm afraid of that too.

2031.accept_chat_bubble: I'll just stay up here and um, watch this gate.
2031.chat_state_1: Mad Scientists? What's next, Skeleton Dentists?
2031.chat_state_2: Take a friend with you! I would!
2031.chat_state_3: Do you want to do this job? Please?
2031.completion_succeed_tip: Return to Hari Howzen at the mouth of the Ninjago Caves.
2031.in_progress: Smash 4 Skeleton Mad Scientists and 2 Bone Wolves in the Ninjago Caves.
2031.offer: I took this post because I thought it'd be safe! Can you smash 4 Skeleton Mad Scientists and 2 Bone Wolves?
2031.offer_repeatable: I took this post because I thought it'd be safe! Can you smash 4 Skeleton Mad Scientists and 2 Bone Wolves?
2031.ready_to_complete: I wonder how Toshiro is doing up there. It can't be worse than down here!

2032.accept_chat_bubble: A well-timed burst of Spinjitzu should make short work of those Tower legs!
2032.chat_state_1: We can't withstand that barrage forever!
2032.chat_state_2: Be sure to smash the coffins before those uglies pop out!
2032.completion_succeed_tip: Return to Toshiro Gojira, the Monastery Guard.
2032.in_progress: Smash 10 Skeleton Coffins and 1 Skeleton Siege Tower on the Ninjago Battlefield.
2032.offer: Battle back the boneheads! Smash 10 of their Coffins and then topple 1 Siege Tower!
2032.offer_repeatable: Battle back the boneheads! Smash 10 of their Coffins and then topple 1 Siege Tower!
2032.ready_to_complete: The Ninjas taught you well! Man, they're so cool.

2033.accept_chat_bubble: After you rebuild the Siege Shields, get a bunch of Skeletons to follow you over to the target!
2033.chat_state_1: Hope you can build as well as you break bones!
2033.chat_state_2: If there are Skeletons around when you rebuild the Weapons Crates, they'll get a surprise!
2033.completion_succeed_tip: Return to Toshiro Gojira, the Monastery Guard.
2033.in_progress: Smash and rebuild 4 Skeleton Siege Shields and 3 Maelstrom Weapon Crates on the Ninjago Battlefield.
2033.offer: Let's do some damage control out there! Smash and rebuild 4 Siege Shields and 3 Maelstrom Weapon Crates!
2033.offer_repeatable: Let's do some damage control out there! Smash and rebuild 4 Siege Shields and 3 Maelstrom Weapon Crates!
2033.ready_to_complete: I never get tired of seeing those arrows rain down. Beautiful.

2034.accept_chat_bubble: Clear out the Skeletons before you try to rebuild the Catapults!
2034.chat_state_1: Time to put a bounce in your step!
2034.chat_state_2: Those Skeleton Bouncers come in pretty handy!
2034.chat_state_3: You racked up a lot of air miles with that mission!
2034.completion_succeed_tip: Return to Toshiro Gojira, the Monastery Guard.
2034.in_progress: Smash and rebuild 2 Skeleton Catapults and 5 Skeleton Bouncers on the Ninjago Battlefield.
2034.offer: You're not afraid of heights, are you? Smash and rebuild 2 Skeleton Catapults and 5 Skeleton Bouncers!
2034.offer_repeatable: Time to fly! Smash and rebuild 2 Skeleton Catapults and 5 Skeleton Bouncers!
2034.ready_to_complete: You are one awesome flying Ninja!

2035.accept_chat_bubble: Don't fall in that big pit in the Lightning Garden! It hurts.
2035.chat_state_1: Musty caves smell like sadness wrapped in a blanket of fear.
2035.chat_state_2: You can find Bamboo growing in any of the gardens.
2035.chat_state_3: What is that wonderful scent I smell? Is it you?
2035.completion_succeed_tip: Return to Hari Howzen at the mouth of the Ninjago Caves.
2035.in_progress: Smash 5 Lightning Blossoms, 5 Fire Blossoms and 5 Bamboo around the Monastery.
2035.offer: I miss the smell of flowers! Smash 5 Lightning Blossoms, 5 Fire Blossoms and 5 Bamboo for me!
2035.offer_repeatable: I miss the smell of flowers! Smash 5 Lightning Blossoms, 5 Fire Blossoms and 5 Bamboo for me!
2035.ready_to_complete: Mmm, you're covered in the sweet smell of smashed flowers! Sniff, sniff. Cry.

2036.accept_chat_bubble: There's something about the smell of frozen earth that makes me think of winter.
2036.chat_state_1: Do you smell that? It smells like cave. Boo.
2036.chat_state_2: Look for the flowers in the gardens. Don't fall in the quicksand!
2036.completion_succeed_tip: Return to Hari Howzen at the mouth of the Ninjago Caves.
2036.in_progress: Smash 5 Ice Blossoms, 5 Earth Blossoms and 5 Bamboo around the Monastery.
2036.offer: It smells so musty down here. If you smash 5 Ice Blossoms, 5 Earth Blossoms and 5 Bamboo, I can catch their scent!
2036.offer_repeatable: It smells so musty down here. If you smash 5 Ice Blossoms, 5 Earth Blossoms and 5 Bamboo, I can catch their scent!
2036.ready_to_complete: Hold your weapon up to my nose. Don't cut me. Mmm, that's lovely.

2037.accept_chat_bubble: Look for Johnny Umami inside the Monastery.
2037.chat_state_1: My tummy is all rumbly. And it's not from all this battle!
2037.chat_state_2: You may need to help him make these dishes first!
2037.chat_state_3: Mmm I can taste that mud sauce already.
2037.completion_succeed_tip: Take the Dirt Sandwich and Chilly Freezesteak back to Toshiro Gojira.
2037.in_progress: Toshiro Gojira wants a Dirt Sandwich and a Chilly Freezesteak from Johnny Umami.
2037.offer: I need to keep my strength up! Can you bring me a Dirt Sandwich and a Chilly Freezesteak from Johnny Umami?
2037.offer_repeatable: I need to keep my strength up! Can you bring me a Dirt Sandwich and a Chilly Freezesteak from Johnny Umami?
2037.ready_to_complete: How can something made with dirt taste so good? Om nom nom.

2038.accept_chat_bubble: Yucki-Yaki makes my breath smell like sweaty feet, but it tastes so good!
2038.chat_state_1: I'm so hungry I could gnaw on a Skeleton. Wait, that's gross.
2038.chat_state_2: Johnny Umami baked my first birthday cake! It had fish in it.
2038.chat_state_3: I'm so hungry I can't remember my own name!
2038.completion_succeed_tip: Take the Yucki-Yaki and Bento Blocks back to Hari Howzen.
2038.in_progress: Hari Howzen wants 1 order of Yucki-Yaki and 2 Bento Blocks from Johnny Umami.
2038.offer: Johnny Umami makes some weird stuff, but boy is it tasty! Can you get me some Yucki-Yaki and 2 Bento Blocks?
2038.offer_repeatable: Johnny Umami makes some weird stuff, but boy is it tasty! Can you get me some Yucki-Yaki and 2 Bento Blocks?
2038.ready_to_complete: Om nom nom. Don't watch me eat!

2039.accept_chat_bubble: I wonder what kind of bait the Skeletons are using to capture those villagers.
2039.chat_state_1: Either those Skeletons are very smart, or those villagers are not!
2039.chat_state_2: I used to live in the village, but then I got this job. I think mucking out the barn was much better.
2039.chat_state_3: Did you find them all? Even Gloomy Megumi? She cries a lot.
2039.completion_succeed_tip: Return to Hari Howzen at the mouth of the Ninjago Caves.
2039.in_progress: Rescue all 6 of the Ninjago Villagers from the Skeleton Cages in the Ninjago Caves.
2039.offer: The Skeletons keep capturing our villagers! Can you rescue all 6 of them again?
2039.offer_repeatable: The Skeletons keep capturing our villagers! Can you rescue all 6 of them again?
2039.ready_to_complete: I don't know why those villagers don't just all go home. They wouldn't keep getting captured!

2040.accept_chat_bubble: You must be swift and nimble to find all 4 of the Dragon Relics!
2040.chat_state_1: The Spirits of the Dragons watch over our Monastery!
2040.chat_state_2: Each Dragon Relic you collect increases our protection!
2040.chat_state_3: The Monastery is a little safer today. Thank you.
2040.completion_succeed_tip: Return to Sensei Wu in the Ninjago Monastery.
2040.in_progress: Collect all 4 Elemental Dragon Relics from the 4 Gardens in the Monastery, then return to Sensei Wu.
2040.offer: Hidden in the 4 Gardens are 4 Elemental Dragon Relics! Collect all 4 to light these protective Dragon Beacons!
2040.offer_repeatable: Hidden in the 4 Gardens are 4 Elemental Dragon Relics! Collect all 4 to light these protective Dragon Beacons!
2040.ready_to_complete: The Dragon Beacons are lit, and look! The Dragon has rewarded you with a surprise! Open it up!
